org.apache.archiva.metadata.repository.stats.model

Interface RepositoryStatistics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MetadataFacet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRepositoryStatistics

    public interface RepositoryStatistics
extends MetadataFacet
    Provides statistics data of metadata repositories.
    Since:
    2.3

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The count value.

      • getCustomValue

        long getCustomValue(String fieldName)
        Reads custom statistic values that are store implementation specific.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - A unique field name.

      • setCustomValue

        void setCustomValue(String fieldName,
                    long count)
        Saves custom statistic values that are store implementation specific. The field name should be unique (e.g. prefixed by the package name of the data provider).
        Parameters:
        fieldName - A unique field name.
        count - The statistic counter value
